content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Coal mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper plate factory
No entities found

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when setting research
-  Ensure the research technology is valid and available before setting it
### Errors when mining
-  Make sure the chest at the drop position is not full before mining
-  Ensure the fuel source is not full before mining
### Errors when smelting
-  Make sure there are ingredients to smelt before starting the furnace
### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Ensure the chest is not full before using the burner inserter
-  Make sure there are source items before using the burner inserter
